description: The Department of National defence requires 8-port secure KVM switches and cables or equivalent.
duration_in_months: They are looking to award a contract that will last indefinitely.
full_summary:
## 2BH3146618/A 8 Port Secured KVM Switches and Cables for the Department of National Defence

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of 8 port secured KVM switches and cables or equivalent. 

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 2BH3146618/A
* Contracting Entity Name: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* Solicitation Reference Number: SSC-23-00023409:T
* Trade Agreements: This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-16T14:00:00
* Tender Description: The Department of National Defence is seeking secure KVM switches and cables to support its operations. The selected supplier will be required to deliver the goods to the Department's facility in Gatineau, QC, within 90 federal government working days from the contract award.
* Evaluation Method: Proposers must submit their bids through the P2P portal. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Documents and Intentions

* Interested suppliers may access the solicitation documents and submit their bids by clicking this link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to: Michael Boualavong, Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada, 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8, Telephone: (613) 402-889
